short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable Velocity Scores (Story Points) for waffle.io, so you can estimate the amount of work for each issue

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension of Velocity Scores for waffle.io, ported from https://gist.github.com/jhubert/8eec558ab8cea9fd4aaa which renders velocity scores based on the content of the GitHub issue title.
